summary:
Much parts such bikini-ness.

...now with added calcium.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VBFhJTY.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]DESC[/b]

Hi little mortal! I'm nisetanaka I used be adventure like you but...ok fuck this nonsense, I'm seriously tired for being silly ass.

this mod adds some armor. well... not really it more than like bikini for suicide I guess.plz install this mod if you are very emo.
but who cares about logic?logic for pussys am I right? no?  ok then.

actually this description doesn't explain anything about the mod  so far.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]uPdate[/b]

0.94
fixed issue with tassetB not having proper weight support set up.

0.93
add face mask kind thing,new abs guards,also you can equip tassets and abs prts together for now,

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]INSTALL

[/b]I don't know, ask yo mama

UN[b]INSTALL

Why?[/b]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]HOW DO I GET THE ARMOR[/b]

This time you don't need any perks.
but you need crafting book "The amazing world of bikini armor vol.4"
when you have the book,crafting menu appears.yes I stole the idea from other modder.


Go riverwood alvor's forge, you can find the book! gotta steal it!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DBem3gl.png[/img]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]

XPMS or XPMSE something like that skeleton

HDT maybe

and heart of bikini lover

...and screenshots. LOTS OF SCREENSHOTS [color=#f4cccc][color=#ffff00](posing for shots without thongs equipped is STRONGLY encouraged but not required ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°), just saying)[/color].[/color]
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]So what's nekst?

[/b]I didn't decide it uhm..orc? [s]falmer[/s]? or maybe...I don't know,who cares (Kofman77 cares actually).

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]permission for fello modda[/b]

you are free to use this crap for any your mods without asking for permission, just don't monitize it

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Qu and Ah

[/b]Q "wow" "such bug" "much clipping"
A I'm a shitty modder. bug report plz seriously.

Q who is the girl on those images?where can I get it?
A my main screenshot b!tch. I'm not interested make follower,so you can't. The blonde however is Kofman77's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59097/?]Rosa[/url].

Q racemenu data?
A I'm ECE user,if you feel face making is difficult use damn ECE.

Q skin texture?
A modified Mature diffuse(not new one) and SG normal for face.

Q share?
A nein, I don't have permission.

Q ENB?
A "ANKO ENB BETA"based

Q other body mod support?
A I'm making 7B and UNP (UNP is lower priority,I don't use that so much)
   also CBBE and BS2 Convert work is Kofman77's domain. [color=#ffd966]Appease him with thong-less screenshot plz. [/color]

Q uunp?
A negn.but Diablio did it! you should be thankful!

Q why you keep spamming this unrealistic shit? are u 12 years boy?
A because I want and yes I'm 12 "mom mean people are bullying me!"

Q who reads this Q&A?
A So far No one. I'm keep gettin sh!t ton of pm and comment bout those stuffs.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][b]By the nine divines. [/b]You are reading this description so far.

[/b]I'm grateful, I thought no one reads description page.but you made it!
this is the extra gift for you

go to [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Hamvir's_Rest]hamvir's rest[/url],and defeat the unique draugr it called "Rahvok" he was a great bikini lover.
but one day he realized he is a guy,he couldn't wear bikini properly.
deep despair broke his heart.and his soul was collapsed.
he has 2 armor "Dragon Bone Assault mask"and"Dragon Scale Sling Bikini"

defeat him! that's not so hard.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VkzffsM.png[/img]
